Reviews.Title: Expectations
Reviews.Author: drbo
Reviews.Content: When I first recieved this tablet, I was very excited, but that soon turned to dismay, although the colors were great, the machine continually went into an automatic reboot, I could not read anything for more than a minute or two.I returned it to Amazon and they very quickly returned my money and apologised for the inconvenience.Well done Amazon

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Fran
Reviews.Content: I owned a XOOM that I dropped and broke this replacement is perfect for my use. Too bad no longer made.

Reviews.Title: big mistake
Reviews.Author: jan wagley
Reviews.Content: When I purchased it, I knew there were no accessories, but I expected it to have a power cord.  There was nothing and the battery was dead and no way to charge it .  I checked around for a power cord, but nothing was available so I returned it.  Sort of a joke!

Reviews.Title: recommended
Reviews.Author: Tatiana Ofri
Reviews.Content: Good,  nice, and pleasant. My mother playing games, watching you tube, talking to friends on a Skype. She is happy having fun. So many things for very little money.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: James C Akre Jr
Reviews.Content: Only had it for maybe a month but it works great. It only took four hours to find one for this price and quality.

Reviews.Title: xoom
Reviews.Author: luis alberto
Reviews.Content: i got the motorola xoom, and i was very happy the way it was working, but after 5days of used, it just stop working, it when off, and i couldnt get it to turn on again, its a good tablet, but i think DEALVILLE didnt do a good job getting it fix,

Reviews.Title: touchscreen unresponsive
Reviews.Author: theblob654
Reviews.Content: I got this item in the mail today and the touchscreen was unresponsive out of the box.  I was under the impression that factory refurbished meant that they fix broken items then sold them again.  I didnt know that actually meant that they send the broken item out still broken

Reviews.Title: Hubby loves this
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Second one to own. Great product better than iPad I think! He recommends to all friends, when asked about it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: This tablet is exactly as described. All my expectations were met and exceeded. I would recommend buying to anyone. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Does everything I want it to
Reviews.Author: cameron brumfield
Reviews.Content: Have had no problems with this product thus far. I'm in law school and it is great as a study aid.
